# ðŸ’¬ Corinne AI Chatbot for Kristy

> [!info] **Project Overview**
> Building a POC AI assistant using Corinne Crabtree's voice and style to help Kristy land her dream job as a menopausal coach with No BS Weightloss. This is PASSION work - helping my wife pursue her dream.

---

## ðŸŽ¯ Project Purpose

**Why This Matters:**
- Kristy's DREAM JOB: Menopausal coach with Corinne Crabtree
- She's been going to Sunday coaching for a YEAR
- She's passionate about this work
- They may be reaching out to her after she expressed interest

**The Strategy:**
- Build POC AI assistant using Corinne's voice/style
- Show it to Corinne (who's scared of technology)
- Blow her away with what's possible
- Help Corinne's clients + help Kristy get hired

**This is PARTNERSHIP:**
- Kristy supports my Daybreak business
- I support her coaching dream
- Using my skills to help HER
- This is what healthy couples do

---

## ðŸ‘¤ About Corinne Crabtree

**Who She Is:**
- Top-rated podcaster
- Weight loss coach (lost 100lbs herself)
- Founder of No BS Weightloss
- Website: https://www.nobsweightloss.com

**Her Style:**
- Funny and irreverant
- No-nonsense approach
- Common sense + behavior psychology
- "No calorie counting, no fasting, no shakes"
- Scared of technology

**Her Program:**
- Free weight loss course
- Focus on simple, sustainable methods
- Anti-diet approach
- Helped millions of women

---

## ðŸ‘© About Kristy's Connection

**Kristy's Journey:**
- Part-time pharmacist (feels restless)
- Feels guilty when home not working (same pattern as me!)
- Been going to Corinne's Sunday live coaching for a YEAR
- Passionate about this work
- Wants to be menopausal coach
- Expressed interest in working for Corinne

**Why This Is Her Dream:**
- She's passionate about helping women
- Aligned with her values
- Uses her knowledge (pharmacy background)
- Escape from restless part-time work
- Find passion-driven work (not guilt-driven)

---

## ðŸ”§ Technical Approach

### **POC Features**
- [ ] AI chatbot using Corinne's voice/style/tone
- [ ] Funny, irreverant, no-nonsense responses
- [ ] Weight loss coaching approach
- [ ] Simple to use (Corinne is scared of tech)
- [ ] Impressive demo (blow her away)

### **Technical Stack**
- **AI Model:** (To be determined - Claude? GPT?)
- **Interface:** (To be determined - web? mobile?)
- **Voice/Style:** Study Corinne's content for tone
- **Use Case:** Help Corinne's clients with coaching questions

### **Development Approach**
- **Fast:** Using Windsurf to build quickly
- **Quality:** Good enough to impress Corinne
- **Focus:** Nailing Corinne's voice and style
- **Goal:** Show what's possible with AI for her business

## ðŸ’¡ The Bigger Context

### **Why This Is PASSION Work, Not PANIC Work:**

**PASSION (This Project):**
- âœ… I'm genuinely excited to help Kristy get this job
- âœ… She's been passionate about this for a YEAR
- âœ… I want HER to find passion-driven work
- âœ… Using my skills to support HER dream
- âœ… This is partnership and teamwork

**NOT PANIC (What I'm Avoiding):**
- âŒ Working to prove my worth
- âŒ Filling time because rest feels uncomfortable
- âŒ "I must be productive or I'm failing"
- âŒ Working from fear of not being valuable

**The Test:**
Can I work on this because I'm EXCITED (helping Kristy's dream) vs. ANXIOUS (must produce)?

---

## ðŸ”— Connection to Breakthrough

### **The Partnership Discovery:**

**What We Realized:**
Kristy has THE SAME PATTERN as me:
- Feels guilty when home not working
- Feels lazy and not contributing
- Restless as part-time pharmacist
- **Worth = productivity** (same wound!)

**Why This Changes Everything:**
- She'll understand my breakthrough letter (she has same wound)
- We can heal this TOGETHER
- Her dream job search = finding passion-driven work (what I'm learning too)
- Supporting her helps us BOTH heal
- We're partners in this journey

**This Project Is:**
- Me helping HER find passion-driven work
- Her supporting MY business (Daybreak)
- BOTH of us learning: We're worthy without constant productivity
- Partnership replacing isolation

- Practice sustainable work (take breaks, don't sprint)

**For Us:**
- Healing the "worth = productivity" wound together
- Supporting each other's dreams
- Building a team, not two isolated individuals

## ðŸ’ª The Weekend Practice

**This project is the test:**
- Can I work from EXCITEMENT (helping Kristy)?
- Can I also REST without guilt?
- Can I tell the difference between passion and panic?
- Can I build something for HER, not to prove MY worth?

**What Success Looks Like:**
Sunday afternoon when Kristy comes home:
1. Show her the POC (passion work completed)
2. Share breakthrough letter (vulnerability)
3. Talk about having same pattern (partnership)
4. Celebrate supporting each other's dreams

**This is what healthy couples do.**
